sentences.sContent: The robbers were armed with sawn-off shotguns (= ones that have been made shorter, so the balls go in different directions ) .
sentences.sCn: 抢劫者手持枪管被锯短的猎枪。

phrases.pCn: 运输途中担任护卫；坐在汽车前面的旅客座上

trans.tranOther: a long gun fired from the shoulder, that shoots many small round balls at one time, used especially for killing birds or animals
